scenes.description: Celebratory birthday messages and greetings from the group.
Brief clips showing interactions and a segment of a song performance.
The group gathers for a game segment, introducing and playing 'Posing Twister'.

subtitles.original: Congrats!
subtitles.english: Congrats!

subtitles.original: Happy Birthday!
subtitles.english: Happy Birthday!

subtitles.original: Happy Birthday!
subtitles.english: Happy Birthday!

subtitles.original: Happy birthday, I guess.
subtitles.english: Happy birthday, I guess.

subtitles.original: Rissa!
subtitles.english: Rissa!

subtitles.original: You're so fluffy!
subtitles.english: You're so fluffy!

subtitles.original: I love you!
subtitles.english: I love you!

subtitles.english: Ah... what a wonderful birthday this is.

subtitles.original: I've even found a wonderful partner!
subtitles.english: I've even found a wonderful partner!

subtitles.english: It feels like this next year of my life is going to be so amazing!

subtitles.english: I know, my baby!

subtitles.original: Hey, the blind date is over!
subtitles.english: Hey, the blind date is over!

subtitles.original: Snap back to reality. Oh, let's play Twister!
subtitles.english: Snap back to reality. Oh, let's play Twister!

subtitles.original: Oh, yeah!
subtitles.english: Oh, yeah!

subtitles.original: I got Twister ready so we can all play together!
subtitles.english: I got Twister ready so we can all play together!

subtitles.original: Looking at it, it might be a bit tricky for all five of us to play at once though.
subtitles.english: Looking at it, it might be a bit tricky for all five of us to play at once though.

subtitles.original: Yeah, I think you might be right.
subtitles.english: Yeah, I think you might be right.

subtitles.original: What should we do then?
subtitles.english: What should we do then?

subtitles.original: Um... well, how about to make it fun, we can play one at a time?
subtitles.english: Um... well, how about to make it fun, we can play one at a time?

subtitles.original: You know what, actually, I've just thought of a special rule for today!
subtitles.english: You know what, actually, I've just thought of a special rule for today!

subtitles.original: Let's call the game: Posing Twister!
subtitles.english: Let's call the game: Posing Twister!

subtitles.original: Posing Twister
subtitles.english: Posing Twister

subtitles.original: As the name suggests, the rule is to strike poses while playing Twister.
subtitles.english: As the name suggests, the rule is to strike poses while playing Twister.

subtitles.original: For example, if the instruction says:
subtitles.english: For example, if the instruction says:

subtitles.original: "Right hand on red, and cat pose", you place your right hand on red and do the cat pose.
subtitles.english: "Right hand on red, and cat pose", you place your right hand on red and do the cat pose.

subtitles.original: Once all four limbs are in position, you can move just one limb to strike the specific pose.
subtitles.english: Once all four limbs are in position, you can move just one limb to strike the specific pose.

subtitles.original: The time limit will be one minute, and if you can keep your balance for the full minute, you can clear the challenge.
subtitles.english: The time limit will be one minute, and if you can keep your balance for the full minute, you can clear the challenge.

subtitles.original: But, if you lose your balance at any point, the game is over.
subtitles.english: But, if you lose your balance at any point, the game is over.

subtitles.original: Quick question!
subtitles.english: Quick question!

subtitles.original: Yes?
subtitles.english: Yes?

subtitles.original: Can audience mess with the player?
subtitles.english: Can audience mess with the player?

subtitles.original: Yeah, why not?
subtitles.english: Yeah, why not?

subtitles.original: So, who wants to go first?
subtitles.english: So, who wants to go first?

subtitles.original: I'll go first! Ok, Mococo-chan!
